search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | stats values(businessGroup) as bg by businessGroup

panel.title: Platform Benefits

single.title: Developer Productivity - Current

search.query: index=$platformBenefitsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(developerProductivity) as total | stats max(total) as "Productivity"

single.title: Savings from API Reuse - Current

search.query: index=$platformBenefitsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(savingFromAPIReuse) as total | stats max(total) as "Savings"

single.title: Savings from Maintenance Productivity - Current

search.query: index=$platformBenefitsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(savingFromMaintenanceProductivity) as total | stats max(total) as "Savings"

single.title: Savings from Reuse In Maintenance - Current

search.query: index=$platformBenefitsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(savingFromReuseInMaintenance) as total | stats max(total) as "Savings"

single.title: Total Savings - Current

search.query: index=$platformBenefitsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(totalSavings) as total | stats max(total) as "Savings"

panel.title: Platform Benefits - Total Savings - Timeline

chart.title: Platform Benefits - Total Savings - Timeline

search.query: index=$platformBenefitsIndex$ | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | chart values(totalSavings) as "Savings" by _time, businessGroup

panel.title: Platform Benefits - Total Savings by type - Timeline

chart.title: Platform Benefits - Total Savings by type - Timeline

search.query: index=$platformBenefitsIndex$ | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | chart values(savingFromAPIReuse) as "API Reuse", values(savingFromMaintenanceProductivity) as "Maintenance Productivity", values(savingFromReuseInMaintenance) as "Reuse in Maintenance" by _time, businessGroup

panel.title: Runtime Manager - Production - OnPrem - Server Groups - Current Count

single.title: Runtime Manager - Production - OnPrem - Server Groups - Current Count

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(runtimeManagerMetrics.hybrid.production.serverGroups) as total | stats max(total) as "Applications"

panel.title: Runtime Manager - Production - OnPrem - Applications - Current Count

single.title: Runtime Manager - Production - OnPrem - Applications - Current Count

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(runtimeManagerMetrics.hybrid.production.applicationsTotal) as total | stats max(total) as "Applications"

panel.title: Runtime Manager - Production - OnPrem - Applications by Status - Current

chart.title: Runtime Manager - Production - OnPrem - Applications by Status - Current

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(runtimeManagerMetrics.hybrid.production.applicationsStarted) as started, values(runtimeManagerMetrics.hybrid.production.applicationsStopped) as stopped | stats max(started) as "Started", max(stopped) as "Stopped" | transpose

panel.title: Runtime Manager - Production - OnPrem - Applications by Status - Timeline

chart.title: Runtime Manager - Production - OnPrem - Applications by Status - Timeline

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | chart values(runtimeManagerMetrics.hybrid.production.applicationsStarted) as "Started", values(runtimeManagerMetrics.hybrid.production.applicationsStopped) as "Stopped" by _time, businessGroup

panel.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - OnPrem - Servers - Current Count

table.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - OnPrem - Runtime versions - Current Count

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | rename runtimeManagerMetrics.hybrid.sandbox.runtimesUsed{} as "Runtime versions" | table "Runtime versions"

panel.title: Runtime Manager - RTF - Cores total - Current Count

single.title: Runtime Manager - RTF - Cores total - Current Count

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.capacity.coresTotal) as total | stats max(total) as "vCores"

chart.title: Runtime Manager - RTF - Cores by Status - Current

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.applications.sandbox.coresUsed) as sandboxUsed, values(runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.applications.production.coresUsed) as productionUsed | stats max(sandboxUsed) as "Sandbox Used", max(productionUsed) as "Production Used" | transpose
